publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3138 Fiona Hyslop: Congratulations to Linlithgow Rose—That the Parliament congratulates Linlithgow Rose junior football club on winning the Scottish Junior Cup for the first time since 1967; acknowledges the hard work of the players, the backroom staff and the committee in building this success, and congratulates the club’s supporters on helping to make Sunday a celebration of junior football.

S1M-3138 Fiona Hyslop: Congratulations to Linlithgow Rose—That the Parliament congratulates Linlithgow Rose junior football club on winning the Scottish Junior Cup for the first time since *1965*; acknowledges the hard work of the players, the backroom staff and the committee in building this success, and congratulates the club’s supporters on helping to make Sunday a celebration of junior football. Supported by: Michael Matheson*, Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-3138 Congratulations to Linlithgow Rose (lodged on 21 May 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-3138 Fiona Hyslop: Congratulations to Linlithgow Rose—That the Parliament congratulates Linlithgow Rose junior football club on winning the Scottish Junior Cup for the first time since 1965; acknowledges the hard work of the players, the backroom staff and the committee in building this success, and congratulates the club’s supporters on helping to make Sunday a celebration of junior football. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Stewart Stevenson, Mr Kenny MacAskill
S1M-3138 Congratulations to Linlithgow Rose (lodged on 21 May 2002) Michael Russell*
S1M-3138 Congratulations to Linlithgow Rose (lodged on 21 May 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
